title: VIDEO: Esker Cycles – The Link With Takashi Minamiura
content:
Esker Cycles presents The Link with Takashi Minamiura. Watch as Takashi rides his bike to snowboard and then hits some trails on the way home.

The post VIDEO: Esker Cycles – The Link With Takashi Minamiura appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
